name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cut chicken into cubes. Sauté onions and spices. Add chicken and cook. Add tomatoes and simmer.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Cut vegetables. Heat oil. Stir fry vegetables. Add sauce and seasonings.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown beef. Season with spices. Warm tortillas. Assemble with toppings.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix ingredients. Add dressing and toss.

name: Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté mushrooms. Make cream sauce. Combine all ingredients.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken. Make curry base. Cook chicken. Add cream and butter.

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Cook rice. Prepare vegetables. Layer with spices. Steam until done.

name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta. Prepare sauce. Mix with eggs and cheese. Add bacon.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce. Make dressing. Combine ingredients. Top with chicken.

name: Sushi Roll
instructions: Prepare rice. Roll with fillings. Cut into pieces. Serve with wasabi.
